rules_text:
Choose one –
• Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
• Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
[i]“Respect the denizens of the Holt, but do not fear them. These lands provide for their needs, so if one wants something from you, it won't be your flesh.”
—Amarell, elder of New Tensuo[/i]
